tweet_text:
@drvolts Thanks, but I have spent some time in Seattle on occasion and I've lived in Paris, SF and OC

as my tweet said: what you are saying is true, and YES it is very much relative compared to the US, it's the "everyone loves paris again" that made me raise an eyebrow
